alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 3:04AM PST until December 26 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Ice accumulations of a tenth of an inch or less. * WHERE...Cascades mountains of Snohomish and King Counties at Stevens and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Easterly winds in the passes this morning will create a shallow layer of cold air near the surface for freezing rain at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
